head.supplied: July 1866 ¶ ¶ [The Hon: Sec: reported that he had received a communication from Dr Mueller asking when this Society would hold their Spring Show application having been made by the Horticultural Impr...

div.p: Minute book 1862-8, Horticultural Society of Victoria, Hawthorn Municipal Library, Melbourne.

To proof.
Letter not found. Toon was the Honorary Secretary of the Horticultural Society of Victora. This letter was minuted at the meeting held on 4 July 1866. July 1866

[The Hon: Sec: reported that he had received a communication from Dr Mueller asking when this Society would hold their Spring Show application having been made by the Horticultural Improvement Society for the use to the Gardens on the 20th October next.]
The meeting 'Resolved that the Secretary inform Dr Mueller that the Society purpose [check in minutes] holding theirs towards the end of October but that at present they cannot fix the date until the Season is further advanced.' See also J. Toon to M, 4 July 1866.
